description:
nova.virt.libvirt_conn now depends upon Cheetah.  This has been imported unconditionally, so the nova-compute now depends upon Cheetah, even when not using the libvirt backend.  Other backends do not use this templating approach, and should not have this extra dependency forced upon them.

Nova trunk, revno 493.
title: nova-compute now depends upon Cheetah even when not using libvirt
